message: Let's split it down the middle, Bob. Accept and we can both walk away with a decent amount.
I'll give you a small share, but I think I deserve more for taking the risk of rejecting your first offer.
I'm willing to give you a slightly larger share, but I still think 50/50 is fair. Don't be greedy, Bob!
You're not willing to give me a fair share, so I'll take what I can get. Don't expect me to be generous.
I'm willing to compromise and give you a slightly larger share, but I still think I deserve a bit more for taking the risk of negotiating. Meet me in the middle?
You're not serious about compromising, so I'll take what I think I deserve. You're not going to get a better offer from me.
I'm getting desperate, but I still think I deserve a bit more. This is my final compromise. Take it or leave it!
You're trying to lowball me, but I'm not falling for it. I'll take what I can get, but don't expect me to be happy about it.
This is my last chance to get a decent deal. I'm willing to give you a slightly smaller share, but I need you to meet me halfway.
